alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 2:39PM PDT until November 04 at 1:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stevens Pass, and Stehekin. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Winter travel conditions expected over Stevens Pass this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warming temperatures overnight will result in snow transitioning over to rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
